title: Aprons and Silver Spoons: The Heartwarming Memoirs of a 1930s Kitchen Maid
description: When young Mollie became a 'skivvy' in a stately London townhouse aged just 14, she quickly learned that a large amount of elbow grease and a sense of humour would be tantamount to surviving there. Through Mollie's eyes we are offered a fascinating glimpse into London's invisible 'downstairs', a world that has long-since vanished.
author: Mollie Moran
